summary: The Department of Defense requested about $45.2 billion for FY 2023 for its unclassified information technology, such as communications and business systems. We reviewed the performance of DOD's 25 major IT business programs, including their software development and cybersecurity practices. Of the 25 programs, we found: 13 didn't fully report on the extent to which they achieved their goals, including 3 programs that didn't identify...
title: IT Systems Annual Assessment: DOD Needs to Improve Performance Reporting and Development Planning
